tspan.tspan: * If Ever danger cards in hand is at least Hand Limit
* If at end night phase, cards in hand is at least Hand Limit

text.tspan: * If the bandit tracker reaches the end
'X' can be any number, even Zero
Move up to n spaces. - Not onto Water (from water is allowed)
Climb: Move up to n spaces.

tspan.tspan: If revealing a tile requires more

text.tspan: activate more jobs. You do not need to use all activated movement. If

tspan.tspan: Each bandit group not on a player, rolls the Compas Dice to move 1
(Starting with the most West then North.)
Bandits can move on any type of land (even unrevealed), but if they
would move off the tiles, move them in the opposite direction
For each group of bandits on the board, not on a player. Starting with
the most West then North. They attack all players on that tile.
* Bandits take damage by removing a bandit.
* Players fight together and take damage as 'P' Danger cards
(All players on tile take 1 'P' card per Damage taken.)
1) All players on a the tile may activate '
3) Defenders take one damage for every hit above saves

text.tspan: 4) Defenders counter using their attack against the attackers defence

tspan.tspan: (If bandits are removed completeley, All players who contributed score 2 VP)
In Co-op only score VP once.
